sentences.en: Centuries after Lisa's death, Mona Lisa became the world's most famous painting.

sentences.en: Leonardo's most famous portrait of a woman is called the "Mona Lisa".

sentences.en: In 2005 Lisa was definitively identified as the model of the Mona Lisa.
